t: He that dwelleth{H3427}{H8802)} in the secret{H5643} place of the most High{H5945} shall abide{H3885}{H8698)} under the shadow{H6738} of the Almighty{H7706}.
I will say{H559}{H8799)} of the LORD{H3068}, He is my refuge{H4268} and my fortress{H4686}: my God{H430}; in him will I trust{H982}{H8799)}.
Surely he shall deliver{H5337}{H8686)} thee from the snare{H6341} of the fowler{H3353}, and from the noisome{H1942} pestilence{H1698}.
He shall cover{H5526}{H8686)} thee with his feathers{H84}, and under his wings{H3671} shalt thou trust{H2620}{H8799)}: his truth{H571} shall be thy shield{H6793} and buckler{H5507}.
Thou shalt not be afraid{H3372}{H8799)} for the terror{H6343} by night{H3915}; nor for the arrow{H2671} that flieth{H5774}{H8799)} by day{H3119};
Nor for the pestilence{H1698} that walketh{H1980}{H8799)} in darkness{H652}; nor for the destruction{H6986} that wasteth{H7736}{H8799)} at noonday{H6672}.
A thousand{H505} shall fall{H5307}{H8799)} at thy side{H6654}, and ten thousand{H7233} at thy right hand{H3225}; but it shall not come nigh{H5066}{H8799)} thee.
Only with thine eyes{H5869} shalt thou behold{H5027}{H8686)} and see{H7200}{H8799)} the reward{H8011} of the wicked{H7563}.
Because thou hast made{H7760}{H8804)} the LORD{H3068}, which is my refuge{H4268}, even the most High{H5945}, thy habitation{H4583};
There shall no evil{H7451} befall{H579}{H8792)} thee, neither shall any plague{H5061} come nigh{H7126}{H8799)} thy dwelling{H168}.
For he shall give his angels{H4397} charge{H6680}{H8762)} over thee, to keep{H8104}{H8800)} thee in all thy ways{H1870}.
They shall bear thee up{H5375}{H8799)} in their hands{H3709}, lest thou dash{H5062}{H8799)} thy foot{H7272} against a stone{H68}.
Thou shalt tread{H1869}{H8799)} upon the lion{H7826} and adder{H6620}: the young lion{H3715} and the dragon{H8577} shalt thou trample under feet{H7429}{H8799)}.
Because he hath set his love{H2836}{H8804)} upon me, therefore will I deliver{H6403}{H8762)} him: I will set him on high{H7682}{H8762)}, because he hath known{H3045}{H8804)} my name{H8034}.
He shall call{H7121}{H8799)} upon me, and I will answer{H6030}{H8799)} him: I will be with him in trouble{H6869}; I will deliver{H2502}{H8762)} him, and honour{H3513}{H8762)} him.
With long{H753} life{H3117} will I satisfy{H7646}{H8686)} him, and shew{H7200}{H8686)} him my salvation{H3444}.
